description.jp: 自由をこよなく愛し 相棒のフランと共に頭角を現した若き空賊。ひょんなことからヴァンたちと出会いダルマスカ解放の旅に同行。シャレた言い回しが特徴的な伊達男だが 確執のある父親や自身の過去の話には過敏に反応し ついつい若さが出てしまうことも。
description.gl: A youthful sky pirate deeply attached to the wide blue yonder who roams the world with his partner, Fran. In an unexpected turn of events, he meets Vaan and gets caught up in a quest to restore Dalmasca. Although a man of charm and wit, he becomes highly sensitive when people bring up his past or father.

jp.text: 束縛されるのが嫌いなタイプでね
ここまでとは知らなかったが……
主人公は絶対に\n死なないのさ
自分の身は自分で守るってわけだ\n勇ましいねえ……
お前なら何が欲しい？\n何を探してる？

gl.text: I play the leading man、 who else?
I always knew Fran didn't take well to being tied up.
I just never knew how much.
You know what they say about the leading man? He never dies.
I suppose you'd better hang on then.
So、 we keep to our affairs、 and she to hers.
What is it you want? What are you looking for?

When using Tides of Fate (C):

6-hit group ranged BRV attack + group HP attack delivered 2 times
Deals total HP damage to each target
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
Removes party's debuffs
Steals 3 random buffs from each target
Extends stolen buff duration 1 turn
Self: 8 turns 3 levels of Way of the Sky Pirate (limit 3)

After use:

While special effect Sky-Plying Strahl active:

Additional effects with increased special effect Sky-Plying Strahl level (does not stack with special effects of same name):
 • 1 level – Largely raises own ATK
 Slightly raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV

 • 3 levels – Slightly increases own BRV damage dealt
 • 4 levels – Slightly increases own HP damage dealt

Slightly raises ATK

Tides of Fate use +1

While Way of the Sky Pirate active:
 • BRV Attack, BRV Attack+ becomes BRV Attack++:
 • 3-hit ranged BRV attack
 • Often steals 1 random buff from target
 • Increases active Way of the Sky Pirate level by 1
 • HP Attack, HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++:
 • 3-hit ranged BRV attack + HP attack
 • Increases active Way of the Sky Pirate level by 1
desc.jp:
・自身の攻撃力を小アップ

　-自身に付与されている「空賊の流儀」の段階を1段階アップ

　以下の「HP攻撃＋＋」に変化
　-3HIT遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
　-自身に付与されている「空賊の流儀」の段階を1段階アップ

desc.gl:
Slightly increases own BRV damage dealt

Reduces own BRV consumed by HP attacks (does not reduce HP damage)

At start of quest:
 • First turn does not consume ability use count (some abilities excluded)

When using Tides of Fate:
 • 8-hit group ranged BRV attack + group HP attack becomes 6-hit group ranged BRV attack + group HP attack delivered 2 times; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage

After using Tides of Fate:
 • Snatch Shot, Great Aim use +1 (with upper limit)

Slight boost to raised ATK with 1 level of special effect Sky-Plying Strahl

Slight boost to increased BRV damage dealt with 3 levels of special effect Sky-Plying Strahl

Adds following effects to 1 level of special effect Sky-Plying Strahl:
 • Slightly raises own limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV
desc.jp:
自身の与えるBRVダメージが小アップ
自身のHP攻撃時に消費するBRVが減少する（HPダメージは減少しない）

クエスト開始時
・自身の最初の行動時 アビリティの使用回数を消費しない
　（一部のアビリティを除く）
・自身に特殊効果「天空のシュトラール」3段階付与

「宿命のポルトラン」使用時
・8HIT全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃が
　3HIT全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃を6回行うに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する上限小アップ
・使用後「スナッチショット」「グレイスエイミング」の使用回数＋1（上限あり）

特殊効果「天空のシュトラール」1段階の攻撃力アップと
3段階の与えるBRVダメージアップの効果小アップ
